org.opentcs.util.configuration

Class ConfigurationStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opentcs.util.configuration.ConfigurationStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Deprecated. 
    Use interface bindings and configuration mechanism provided via applications' dependency injection.

    @Deprecated
 @ScheduledApiChange(when="5.0",
                    details="Will be removed.")
public class ConfigurationStore
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This abstract class declares methods for storing and loading configuration data as key/value pairs.

    The configuration data is grouped by namespaces (typically equalling the fully qualified names of the classes using the configuration data, though no guarantees are made that the used namespace are verified to really belong to the calling class).

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ConfigurationStore.NamespaceComparator
      Deprecated. 
      A Comparator that compares the given stores' namespaces.

        Deprecated.

        Parameters:
        key - The key specifying the value to return.
        defaultValue - The default value to return.
        description - A comment describing the function of the configuration
        constraint - Contains the constraints on the item. item. May be null.
        Returns:
        the value associated with the given key, or the given default value.

                    java.lang.String value,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    java.lang.Class<? extends java.lang.Enum<?>> enumClass)
        Deprecated. 
        Set the String value associated with the given key. If the given key is already associated with a value, it is replaced by the given one (regardless of its previous type).
        Parameters:
        key - The key specifying the value to set.
        value - The value to associate with the key.
        enumClass - The Enum class to which the enum value belongs.
        description - A description for this configuration item.

      • setEnum

        public void setEnum(java.lang.String key,
                    java.lang.String value,
                    java.lang.String description,
                    java.util.Set<java.lang.String> values)
        Deprecated. 
        Set the String value associated with the given key. If the given key is already associated with a value, it is replaced by the given one (regardless of its previous type).
        Parameters:
        key - The key specifying the value to set.
        value - The value to associate with the key.
        values - The set of values of the enum.
        description - A description for this configuration item.

      • removeItem

        public ConfigurationItem removeItem(java.lang.String key)
        Deprecated. 
        Removes the configuration item with the specified key if it is present.
        Parameters:
        key - Key of the item
        Returns:
        The removed ConfigurationItem or null if there was no item with the key.
